ygData.subject: Looking for Wisdom Items on The Nameless
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone, I am a level 32 Druid, and up till now, I haven t been overly concerned about my stats.  I have just been thinking about leveling my character.
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone,
        I am a level 32 Druid, and up till now, I haven't been overly concerned about my stats.  I have just been thinking about leveling my character.  Now, as I notice that many other people have higher stats then I do, it has been a concern.  Basically, I am looking for wisdom items.  I don't think AC or strength is too important as I don't plan on meleeing.  Right now my Wis is 121.  I'm not sure what it should be at, but I think it's time for me to start searching for better gear. 
 
If anyone can help me out with tips on where to go, or what type of quests I should be doing, it would be greatly appreciated.
Also, I would prefer to get these items solo if possible.  I do enjoy grouping, however I don't want to have to rely on others to help me get better gear (we all know what other people are like as far as being reliable :)  )
 
Thanks for all you help...
 
Mike
-----Original Message-----
From: The Mad Macinchaote [mailto:scendera@...]
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2001 3:07 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale

I have 54 warr and in some time will have 50+ ranger as well....I'm not looking to sell this for RL cash, I'm just looking to buy some better gear for myself and be able to give generously to my lower level guildies to help them out
----- Original Message -----
From: Nygaard, Jeff
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2001 8:16 AM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale

The place I think he is talking about, you'll need 2 computers and 2 high
lvl characters 53+ and you'll have to work to get the 30k.

23 mobs every 20 minutes.
Each mob will drop atleast 15 plat worth of loot, up to 20 plat sometimes.
15 x 23 = 345 plat every 20 minutes
Work for 10 hours = 34,500 plat

Not a bad work day if you could find enough idiots to buy plat for real US
dollars. But I can tell you, getting this kind of platinum can be done. I
know when I need platinum fast, I can go to this plat hole and grind out
some good plat, also get exp here up to lvl 55.

      -----Original Message-----
      From:      Michael Rhodes [SMTP:mrhodes@...]
      Sent:      Monday, April 30, 2001 5:33 AM
      To:      EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
      Subject:      RE: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale

      I'd be careful giving that info out.... as much as I would love to
know where to get the kind of plat, I'm sure if everyone knew, the place
would be camped worse then any other place in eq
     
      just my 2cp
     
      Mike

            -----Original Message-----
            From: The Mad Macinchaote [mailto:scendera@...]
            Sent: Monday, April 30, 2001 5:22 AM
            To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
            Subject: Re: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale
           
           
            Where?

                  ----- Original Message -----
                  From: Nygaardr, FC3 <mailto:nygaardr@...>

                  To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
<mailto:'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'> 
                  Sent: Monday, April 30, 2001 4:03 AM
                  Subject: RE: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for sale

                  What a rip though.  $150 US for 10,000pp??!?!  So
your telling me I can make $450 US a day playing EQ?  Thats crazy if anyone
would pay that much.  I know of one spot where you can easily farm 30k pp a
day if not more, seems a bit crazy to me,
                 
                  Mu

                        -----Original Message-----
                        From: Michael Rhodes [
mailto:mrhodes@... <mailto:mrhodes@...> ]
                        Sent: Sunday, April 29, 2001 9:27 PM
                        To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
                        Subject: RE: [EverQuest] terris-thule pp for
sale
                       
                       
                        Is there anyone out there that would
actually pay real money for this??  There is no way I would... Am I crazy?
                       
                        Mike
